name: LiveOne
0:
”Alexa, play pop on Slacker”
”Alexa, play Post Malone on Slacker”
”Alexa, play the album Revolver on Slacker”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Now that LiveOne (formerly LiveXLive, formerly Slacker) and Alexa are BFF's, you can ask Alexa to play your favorite LiveOne stations, music to fit your mood or vibe, or practically any artist or genre you can think of.

To get started, link your LiveOne or Slacker account
